trans-unit.source: Specifies the localization attributes for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] class or class member.
trans-unit.target: 지역화 특성에 지정 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] 클래스 또는 클래스 멤버입니다.

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method.
trans-unit.target: 이 특성은 클래스, 속성 또는 메서드에 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 지역화 특성을 사용 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [지역화 특성 및 주석을](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute"></xref> class with a specified localization category.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute"> </xref> 지정된 지역화 범주를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the category setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 대상된 값을 지역화 특성의 범주 설정을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 지역화 특성의 수정 가능 여부 설정을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Category setting|Meaning| |----------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Resource does not belong to a standard category.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A lengthy piece of descriptive text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A single line of text, such as a title.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A short text string, such as a control label.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> or other panel that can contain text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Font-related data such as font family, font style, or font size.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Inherits category from parent node.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource.
trans-unit.target: | 범주 설정 | 즉 | |----------------------|-------------| | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| 리소스 표준 범주에 속해 있지 않습니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| 긴 조각 설명 텍스트입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| 제목 등의 텍스트 한 줄. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| 컨트롤 레이블 등의 짧은 텍스트 문자열입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>또는 관련 컨트롤. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>또는 관련 컨트롤. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>또는 관련 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>같은 컨트롤. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>또는 관련 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>같은 컨트롤. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>또는 관련 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>같은 컨트롤. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton>또는 관련 컨트롤. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>또는 관련 컨트롤. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>또는 관련 컨트롤. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>또는 텍스트를 포함할 수 있는 다른 패널입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.| | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| 글꼴 패밀리, 글꼴 스타일, 글꼴 크기 등의 글꼴 관련 데이터입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| 부모 노드에서 범주를 상속 받습니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| Do not localize this resource.</xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>

trans-unit.source: This does not apply to any child nodes of the resource.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource, or any of its child nodes whose category is set to <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>.|
trans-unit.target: 리소스의 자식 노드에 적용 되지 않습니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>| 이 리소스를 또는로 설정 되어 해당 범주가 자식 노드 중 하나가 지역화 하지 않습니다 <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>. |</xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory> </xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>

trans-unit.source: The category setting of the localization attribute.
Gets or sets the modifiability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 지역화 특성의 대상된 값의 수정 가능 여부 설정을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 지역화 특성의 수정 가능 여부 설정을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Modifiability setting|Meaning| |---------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is not modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value's modifiability is inherited from its parent node.|
trans-unit.target: | 수정 가능성이 설정 | 즉 | |---------------------------|-------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>| 대상된 값은 지역화 담당자가 수정할 수 있습니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>| 대상된 값은 지역화 담당자가 수정할 수 없습니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>| 부모 노드에서 대상된 값의 수정 가능성이 상속 됩니다. |</xref:System.Windows.Modifiability> </xref:System.Windows.Modifiability> </xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>

trans-unit.source: The modifiability setting of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 지역화 특성의 수정 가능 여부 설정입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the readability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 지역화 특성의 대상된 값의 가독성이 설정을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the readability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 지역화 특성의 가독성이 설정을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Readability setting|Meaning| |-------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is readable text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is not readable.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value's readability is inherited from its parent node.|
trans-unit.target: | 가독성 설정 | 즉 | |-------------------------|-------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Readability>| 대상된 값은 읽을 수 있는 텍스트입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Readability>| 대상으로 지정 된 값을 읽을 수 없습니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Readability>| 부모 노드에서 대상된 값의 가독성이 상속 됩니다. |</xref:System.Windows.Readability> </xref:System.Windows.Readability> </xref:System.Windows.Readability>

trans-unit.source: The readability setting of the localization attribute.
